english.segment1: Verse 1: Every step I make. I'm gonna make it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment2: Every step I make. I'm gonna make it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment3: Chorus: Because every round goes, it gets a little (higher, higher, higher ooh).
english.segment4: Verse 2: Every song I sing, I'm gonna sing it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment5: Every song I sing, I'm gonna sing it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment7: Verse 3: Every prayer I pray, I'm gonna pray it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment8: Every prayer I pray, I'm gonna pray it (in the name of Jesus).
english.segment10: Vamp 1: Gonna make it for Jesus, gonna make it for the Lord.
english.segment11: Gonna make it for Jesus, gonna make it for the Lord.
english.segment12: Vamp 2: I'm gonna make it, I'm gonna make it.
